src:
13 Pantai Terindah di Dunia yang Cantik Banget
01 Nov 2019, 20:30 by Puti Yasmin


13 Pantai Terindah di Dunia yang Cantik Banget/Foto: Mustiana Lestari

Jakarta - Pantai cocok menjadi destinasi wisata untuk menghilangkan penat. Nah, ada lho pantai-pantai terindah di dunia yang pas untuk habiskan waktu. Apa saja?Cara menikmati pantai bisa dengan mendengar deburan ombak dan merasakan lembutnya pasir. Selain itu, orang juga bisa berfoto di pantai terindah itu.Berikut pantai terindah di dunia yang dirangkum detikcom:1. Pink SandPantai dengan pasir berwarna merah muda ini terletak di pulau Harbour, Bahama. Dengan terumbu serta gua-gua di dasar laut membuat tempat ini menjadi salah satu pantai terindah di dunia.2. Fraser IslandTerletak di Queensland, Australia pantai ini dijuluki sebagai pantai terindah di dunia. Walaupun begitu, pantai ini juga dikenal mematikan karena terdapat hiu serta anjing liar.3. Pulau VaadhooPantai di pulau Vaadhoo, Maladewa terkenal sangat indah saat malam tiba. Bayangkan saja, pasir menjadi berkelap-kelip cahaya karena adanya produksi dan emisi dari plankton.4. Raja AmpatPantai terindah di dunia ada juga di Indonesia, yakni Raja Ampat. Pulau ini memiliki pasir yang putih serta air jernih yang memanjakan mata.5. Glass BeachPantai indah lainnya juga ada di Amerika Serikat, yaitu Glass Beach. Menjadi indah karena pantai ditutupi kerikil kaca kecil berwarna warni.


Pantai terindah di dunia Foto: (thedapperlad/Instagram)

6. Playa Del AmorPantai Playa Del Amor terletak di tersembunyi di dalam pulau tak berpenghuni di Meksiko. Menikmati deburan pantai di sini seakan-akan memiliki pantai indah pribadi.7. Pantai NavagioPantai Navagio menjadi salah satu pantai terindah di dunia. Pantai itu ditemukan tak sengaja karena kapal rusak terpaksa menepi.8. Pantai PandawaPantai terindah lainnya juga terdapat di Bali, yakni pantai Pandawa. Lokasinya yang berada di tempat terpencil dan penuh tebing membuat pantai memiliki julukan The Secret Beach.9. Pantai KelingkingSelain Pandawa, ada juga pantai Kelingking di Nusa Penida, Bali. Pantai indah ini juga dikenal dengan nama Manta Cliff.10. Phi Phi IslandPantai terindah di dunia ini terletak di Thailand. Bahkan, sangking cantiknya lokasi tersebut sebuah film Hollywood melakukan syuting di sana.


Pantai terindah di dunia Foto: (Thinkstock)

11. Pantai El NidoPantai di Filipina ini juga dikenal sebagai Raja Ampatnya Filipina. Pantai ini identik dengan tebing-tebing batu yang ada di sepanjang pantai.12. Horseshoe BayPantai ini terletak di Bermuda. Tak kalah indah dengan pantai lainnya, pasir di sini juga berwarna merah muda dan air lautnya biru jernih.13. Bora-boraPantai terindah di dunia adalah Bora-bora. Pantai ini terletak di seberang pulau Prancis. Pantai ini dikelilingi laguna serta terumbu karang yang cantik. Simak Video "Menikmati Keindahan Alam Pantai Sanur, Bali "[Gambas:Video 20detik](pay/erd)
text:
13 Most Beautiful Beaches in a Beautiful World
Nov 01 2019, 20:30 by Puti Yasmin


13 Most Beautiful Beaches in a Beautiful World / Photo: Mustiana Lestari

Jakarta - The beach is suitable to be a tourist destination to eliminate fatigue. Well, there are the most beautiful beaches in the world that are perfect for spending time. Anything? How to enjoy the beach by hearing the waves and feeling the soft sand. In addition, people can also take pictures on the most beautiful beach. Following the most beautiful beach in the world, summarized by AFP: 1. Pink SandBeach with pink sand is located on the island of Harbor, Bahamas. With reefs and caves in the ocean floor make this place one of the most beautiful beaches in the world. Fraser Island Located in Queensland, Australia, this beach is dubbed as the most beautiful beach in the world. Even so, this beach is also known to be deadly because there are sharks and wild dogs. Vaadhoo IslandBeach on the island of Vaadhoo, Maldives is famous for its beautiful nightfall. Just imagine, the sand becomes flickering light because of the production and emissions of plankton.4. Raja Ampat The most beautiful beach in the world is also in Indonesia, which is Raja Ampat. This island has white sand and clear water that spoil the eyes.5. Glass Beach Another beautiful beach also exists in the United States, namely Glass Beach. Becomes beautiful because the beach is covered in colorful little glass pebbles.


The most beautiful beach in the world Photo: (thedapperlad / Instagram)

6. Playa Del Amor The Playa Del Amor beach is located hidden inside an uninhabited island in Mexico. Enjoy the beach here as if having a beautiful private beach. Navagio Beach Navagio Beach is one of the most beautiful beaches in the world. The beach was discovered accidentally because the ship was damaged forced to pull over.8. Pandawa Beach Other beautiful beaches are also found in Bali, namely Pandawa beach. Its location is in a remote place and full of cliffs makes the beach has the nickname The Secret Beach.9. Kelingking Beach Besides Pandawa, there is also Kelingking Beach in Nusa Penida, Bali. This beautiful beach is also known as Manta Cliff.10. Phi Phi Island The most beautiful beach in the world is located in Thailand. In fact, the beautiful location of a Hollywood film was filmed there.


The most beautiful beach in the world Photo: (Thinkstock)

11. El Nido Beach This beach in the Philippines is also known as the Raja Ampat of the Philippines. This beach is synonymous with rock cliffs along the coast.12. Horseshoe Bay This beach is located in Bermuda. No less beautiful than other beaches, the sand here is also pink and the sea water is clear blue.13. Bora-bora The most beautiful beach in the world is Bora-bora. This beach is located across the island of France. This beach is surrounded by lagoons and beautiful coral reefs. Check out the video "Enjoying the Natural Beauty of Sanur Beach, Bali" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (pay / erd)
